text: Micah Jacob Schwartzman (born June 1976) is the Joseph W. Dorn Research Professor of Law at the University of Virginia School of Law. In 1997, Schwartzman was given a Rhodes Scholarship. ==References== ==External links== * Faculty page Category:American lawyers Category:American Rhodes Scholars Category:1976 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:University of Virginia School of Law faculty Category:Living people
title: Micah Schwartzman
